Kettering.America's Packard Museum:
America's Packard Museum is an automotive museum located in Dayton, Ohio.


== History ==
The building is a restored Packard dealership transformed into a museum that displays twentieth-century classic Packards and historic Packard artifacts and memorabilia. Originally, The Citizens Motorcar Company sold Packards in Dayton, Ohio beginning in 1908, and moved into what is now the museum building in 1917.
